description: STRING No. 15  // From 2016-10-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // ‘Nada’ was made just after Adan, Jensen’s first child, was born. The paintings resemble his emotions around the time. Lots of energy and confusion packed in color and chaotic figuration.
name: Nada I/II
